TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CachedResourceDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

Docs.summary: Provides a cached dictionary that associates resource dictionaries with their URIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtensions> class that provides XAML markup extensions. Markup extensions return objects based on string attribute values or markup elements in XAML. The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.CachedResourceDictionaryExtension.ProvideValue%2A> method of each extension can use an [IServiceProvider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object at run time that can provide context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> object that can provide services for the markup extension.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that is set as the value of the target property for this markup extension.
Docs.returns: The <xref:System.Object> value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ProvideValue method of each extension can use an [IServiceProvider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object at run time that can provide context.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URI associated with this cached resource dictionary extension.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Uri> associated with this cached resource dictionary extension.
